name: Degen.Food
description: Launching on Ethereum has never been this easy or this cheap. Degen.food delivers the lowest-cost way to launch on-chain, without burning a hole in your wallet. And with 100% free, gasless launches on the horizon, getting your token off the ground has never been more accessible. But we didn’t stop there. Our charting system is built different. Say goodbye to flipping between platforms—Degen.food offers a seamless, uninterrupted chart that follows your token’s entire journey, from launch to migration to Uniswap. You get the full picture, all in one place. And because timing is everything, we’ve got a buy bot that just works. Simple, intuitive, and delivering real-time buy notifications directly to your Telegram, it keeps you informed every step of the way. Even post-migration, you’ll have the data you need, with no interruptions, no downtime. At the end of the day, you’re not just here to launch—you’re here to feast. And at Degen.food, we don’t serve scams. Our platform ensures no hard rugs, no honeypots —just a safe, secure space where you can ape freely. Think of it like your grandma’s secret cookie recipe: tried, tested, and always reliable.
